package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.lsfileal;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractHostToJavaMuleTransformer;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileal.RequestParms;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileal.bind.RequestParmsTransformers;

/**
 * Host Byte Array to RequestParms Mule Transformer.
 * <p/>
 * <code>HostToRequestParmsMuleTransformer</code> takes a byte array in host format
 * (EBCDIC) coming from a source Mainframe as input and turns it into
 * a RequestParms object.
 * <p/>
 * Class generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class HostToRequestParmsMuleTransformer extends AbstractHostToJavaMuleTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a byte array and result will be
     * a RequestParms object.
     */
    public HostToRequestParmsMuleTransformer() {
        super(new RequestParmsTransformers());
        setReturnClass(RequestParms.class);
    }


}
